name: Pigs Is Pigs
summary: The presence of a couple of guinea pigs at the Westcote railroad station create countless offspring as well as a load of paperwork for administrative bureaucrats including by-the-book agent Flannery when their owner won't pay the rate for standard pigs on them. Adapted from Ellis Parker Butler's story, this is one of the oddest shorts on the set, but it is certainly entertaining with its fast-paced, rhyming Irish-jig-like music.
info:
• 中文名: 猪就是猪
  • 上映年度: 1954-05-21
  • 片长: 10分钟
  • 类型: 喜剧 / 动画 / 短片 / 歌舞 / 家庭
  • 导演: Jack Kinney
  • 编剧: Ellis Parker Butler / Leo Salkin
  • 主演: Bob Hamlin / Bill Lee / Gary Owens
